name: Reborn Beyond
description:
For the One Lone Coder Codejam 2022

It's recommended to play on fullscreen mode.

Press 1 to change camera.

You are reborn outside the physical limits of the universe to the point of being in another whole universe, in a world similar to Earth where you can admire its beauty.

Credits:

Everything was created by me except the public domain sounds taken from freesound.

Inspired by one of the works of Aaron Oldenburg.

btw there's a secret down below the terrain, can you find it? :)
